commands.name: az storage container legal-hold clear
commands.syntax:
az storage container legal-hold clear --account-name
                                      --container-name
                                      --tags
                                      [--allow-protected-append-writes-all {false, true}]
                                      [--resource-group]
examples: az storage container legal-hold clear --tags tag1 tag2 --container-name mycontainer --account-name mystorageccount -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az storage container legal-hold set
commands.syntax:
az storage container legal-hold set --account-name
                                    --container-name
                                    --tags
                                    [--allow-protected-append-writes-all {false, true}]
                                    [--resource-group]
examples: az storage container legal-hold set --tags tag1 tag2 --container-name mycontainer --account-name mystorageccount -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az storage container legal-hold show
commands.summary: Get the legal hold properties of a container.
examples: az storage container legal-hold show --account-name mystorageccount --container-name mycontainer
